Blog.post: nth much happened noadays... school really sux.. go school get detention only.. lol.. every tins going so so la.. quite long nv write blog le.. so juz thinkin of writtin a few words ... to fil my blogger.. im gettin along wif her quite ok.. went out.. chat .. talk.. n tt kind of same old stuff.. ahh... lazy to write..

man.. today's so screwed up!! pissed off... haiz.. money got stolen by some assholes.. argh..! my gf.. shes like a robot.. almost all de time i will be de one startin any conversation.. today.. we mit up.. n i ws like no mood at all.. but im like.. ok.. at least i'll be wif her.. but.. yea.. only to noe tt she stood dere like a plank lookin at me at times.. no shit no nth.. no sweet talks.. no words of comfort.. when we're in de train.. she juz stood dere.. n nth more.. wtf man.. nt even a fuckin hug!i cant possibly tell her to do dis tins .. but she juz donno.. today really suck big time mAn.. sux sux sux.. don feel like writtin more le..

lol.. today cant make it to school.. got headach when i woke up.. haiz.. stayed at home whole day.. tmr not going to school too.. yea!! no need to study.. guess i'll juz write a short blog today.. don really haf much to say.. fri haf ndp rehearsal in school.. sux.. don feel like going at all.. my gf is runnin on fri too.. hope she can win some tin.. she needs confidence.. haha.. chatttin wif her rite now.. but.. nth much to tell say.. actually wanted to tell her tt i miss her real hard rite now.. but.. no point tellin her.. she will juz say "orh".. lol.. nth's on tv rite now.. so sian.. if only she can tell me how much she misses me.. haha.. nvm.. chaoz..

juz happen to drop by here.. so decided to type in smtg.. haiz.. im like kinda confuse rite now.. im tinking abt my gf rite now.. haiz.. my mind is in a whirl rite now.. shit it.. its like i luv her n tt kind of stuff.. some unhappy stuff la.. enuff of tt.. its like 240 am rite nw.. n im nt a bit slpy.. mayb i had quite a bad day.. its all jammed up in my mind.. school sux.. don even feel like going dere foreva.. 2 tests tmr.. n im totally unprepared for de tests..kinda hungry .. stomach growling.. argh.. screw it.. too lazy to even move.. haha.. haiz.. i tink i've nt really done any tin for gf.. its like we're always bickering or even quarreling over some slightest issues.. n she luvs to say sry.. but i hate to hear de word comin from her.. cos i tink tt if ur really sry.. u shudent haf done any tin wrong in de 1st place.. mayb im wrong.. but.. its juz me.. lol.. i tink i've made her sad time n time again.. juz wtf m i doing man.. hope tmr will be better.. or shud i say.. ltr? wow.. i dint noe tt writtin a blog is so much so destress.. haha.. at least im feelin better rite now.. yawn.. tired.. gotta rest now.. woohoo.. i luv cherlyn..
